reference.title: Standalone Agent Configuration for Silent Installation

section.title: Examples of the Configuration File for Silent Installation
section.p: See below as an example of the defined configuration file () for standalone agents. You can define your own configuration settings by changing the values.

li.p: For standalone agents, please specify the values of the product_serial_number and txone_license_file with the product serial number and license file name, and then enable silent installation by changing the silent value to 1 and specify password in the configuration file.
To get the license file and product serial number, refer to .
